mapper.select: select s1.p_GOODSDETAIL_NO as parts_no,g.name,gs.name as sizeName, g.filePath || '/' || gd.imgPath img,partsChange_no from goods_Detail gd inner join ( select * from set_parts where m_goodsdetail_no = #{no} ) s1 on gd.goodsdetail_no = s1.p_goodsDetail_no inner join goods g on gd.goods_no = g.goods_no inner join goods_size gs on gd.goodssize_no = gs.goodssize_no order by partsChange_no
